title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Meta's insights on implementing AWS security controls at scale (SEC308)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-Meta关于大规模实施AWS安全控制的见解 (SEC308)
abstract: Join Meta's engineering leadership to explore approaches to data security and governance in the cloud. Learn how Meta views data protection and compliance challenges when operating secure environments at scale. We'll dive into how to build data perimeters, preventive, detective, and reactive layers of security controls using AWS and custom built security tooling.  You'll discover how to programmatically restrict data access to trusted identities and networks using AWS-native controls. Walk away with practical design patterns, architectural solutions, and strategic insights to implement robust data governance in your own environment.
abstract_cn: 加入Meta工程领导团队，探索云端数据安全和治理的方法。了解Meta在大规模运营安全环境时如何看待数据保护和合规挑战。我们将深入探讨如何使用AWS和自定义安全工具构建数据边界、预防性、检测性和响应性安全控制层。您将了解如何使用AWS原生控制以编程方式将数据访问限制为受信任的身份和网络。带走实用的设计模式、架构解决方案和战略见解，在您自己的环境中实施强大的数据治理。
